me.dommi2212.BungeeBridge

Class BungeeBridgeC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • me.dommi2212.BungeeBridge.BungeeBridgeC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandExecutor, TabCompleter, TabExecutor, Plugin

    public class BungeeBridgeC
extends JavaPlugin
    Core class of BungeeBridgeC (Spigot), which provides some useful static methods. Keep in mind you always have to use the same version of BungeeBridgeS (Bungeecord) and BungeeBridgeC (Spigot)! Please see the project Page for additional information.

      • sendKeepAlive

        public static int sendKeepAlive()
        Manually sends a PacketKeepAlive to BungeeBridgeS. Use this to increase the accuracy of PacketGetMOTDServer after setting the MOTD. The return-value is just used to signal the result of the operation. Any error is already handled by BungeeBridgeC.
        Returns:
        The error-code, if an error occurred; else 0

      • getInstance

        public static BungeeBridgeC getInstance()
        Gets the static singleton instance of BungeeBridgeC. This instance should not be used to register Schedulers, Listeners or CommandExecutors.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of BungeeBridgeC.
